name: USD1
description: USD1 is the native stablecoin of the Kinesis ecosystem, pegged 1:1 to the US dollar. Built on the Stellar and ERC-20 blockchains, it offers secure, fast, and low-cost transactions. Fully backed by over $15 billion in high-quality reserves, USD1 provides institutional-grade security, transparency with monthly attestations, and seamless integration within the Kinesis platform. Check out the official website to learn more: https://kinesis.money/pro/usd1/
